Mother mourns Doreion Hard, 23, shot dead in South Wairarapa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/crime/mother-mourns-doreion-hard-23-shot-dead-ind-in-south-wairarapa/ht6t6t2nfnfnrzfcfcfjzb25i65ghgeq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/crime/mother-mourns-doreion-hard-23-shot-dead-ind-in-south-wairarapa/ht6t6t2nfnfnrzfcfcfjzb25i65ghgeq/ Rachel MaherTwo men, aged 23 and 25, are charged with Doreion Hard's death as mum mourns. Sun, 23 Mar 2025 21:14:39 +0000 Doreion Hard, 23, has been named as the man who was shot in South Wairarapa on Saturday. A car he was in stopped near the Carterton New World and Hard was found with a gunshot wound. He later died.
Technical failure in Kaikōura court trial leads to a quashed conviction for Steven Lichtwark https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/a-technical-failure-in-kaikoura-in-court-court-court-trial-leads-to-a-quashed-conviction-for-steven-lichtwark/wl555hf7we5eejnusee5eejnusee5dtyozfm/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/a-technical-failure-in-kaikoura-in-court-court-court-trial-leads-to-a-quashed-conviction-for-steven-lichtwark/wl555hf7we5eejnusee5eejnusee5dtyozfm/ Tara ShaskeyA technical failure in the court resulted in the trial not being recorded or transcribed. Sun, 23 Mar 2025 21:00:00 +0000 Steven Lichtwark claimed he was unwell with Covid-19 at trial and was unable to conduct a proper defence. Photo / Getty Images
Maadi Cup power rankings: Who will claim school rowing’s biggest prize? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sport/maadi-cup-power-rankings-who-will-clair-school-rowings-biggest-biggest-prize/c6n333333bmfbh4ph27vkpguja/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sport/maadi-cup-power-rankings-who-will-clair-school-rowings-biggest-biggest-prize/c6n333333bmfbh4ph27vkpguja/ Mike ThorpeThe Maadi Cup is the pinnacle of secondary school rowing and an icon of NZ college sport. Sun, 23 Mar 2025 16:00:00 +0000 The Hamilton Boys' High School eight celebrating their victory at the 2024 Aon Maadi Cup regatta at Lake Ruataniwha, Twizel. Photo / Picture Show Ltd
